name: Iconduck
description:
Access 120,000+ icons, illustrations and emojis all from Figma


With this this Figma Plugin for Iconduck, you can search through 120,000+ free icons, emojis, graphics, flags, illustrations and clipart to find the perfect vector or SVG for your project.


How to use this plugin:

  1. Click the blue "Install" button on this page
  2. When you're in a Figma design, right-click anywhere on the page (which opens the context menu)
  3. Go to Plugins
  4. Choose Iconduck


The Iconduck plugin will show up. From there, just search for the type of icon you're looking for!


What is Iconduck?

Iconduck is a platform of 120,000+ free open source icons (of all sorts) that you can use for personal and commercial projects.


Popular Icon & Illustration Sets

With 150+ icon, illustration and emoji sets as part of Iconduck, you can search through them all using this plugin. Here are some of the popular sets that are available by using this plugin:


  • Font Awesome
  • Twitter Bootstrap Icons
  • Twemoji (Twitter emojis)
  • Noto Emojis (by Google)
  • EmojiTwo (emojis)
  • Feather Icons
  • Google Material Design Icons
  • OpenMoji (emojis)
  • Mozilla FxEmojis (emojis)
  • Tabler Icons


Licensing:

All icons are listed as open source, under licenses such as: CCO, MIT License, Creative Commons, Unlicense, Apache and more.


More:

Our Figma Plugin allows you to search through, and integrate, icons directly from our platform while using Figma.


Here are some more things you can do from iconduck.com:

  • Download multiple PNG sizes
  • Favorite / like icons to quickly access them
  • Search through specific icon and illustration sets
  • Sign up for notifications on when new icons and illustrations are added


Enjoy the plugin!
